TopicTitle: Low budget travel around Kerbin. Barely made it home.

Articles.Content:
Took some screenshots after starting a new career with Kerbal RnD and a handful of other mods installed (AIES, Mechjeb, Engineer, Stagerecovery etc).

Was just slapping together a rocket to do some testing with the new mod (upgraded ISP), and turned out to be quite the success, despite the rough start. (Did a loop on my way up, pilot says aerodynamic error - mission control claims "carefully planned maneuver).

(Couldnt get the imgur album link to work properly, link is below)

http://imgur.com/a/Y4hUB
